channel.title: Helpdesk PI
channel.description:
Hello im trying to add a command ::helpdesk so when you teleport it sends a message to all the staff, or all palyers and staff aslong as i can get it working.
I really want this so people dont nag me 24/7 all they need to do is do ::helpdesk and a staff will go and help them.
Understand what im saying :P?

item.title: Helpdesk PI
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“xocean, post:18, topic:376286”]Im still having problems…

Any1 guna help ? i’ve tried notepad and microsoft

My msn is antonyharding2255@hotmail.com if you’d prefer to help me faster :D[/quote]Copy it, and then paste it into a new RICH TEXT DOCUMENT then you copy it from the rich text document and paste into ur client.java

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“xocean, post:4, topic:376286”]Hello i need help everytime i try to add it all becomes in 1 line.

like this

-pdpsdpofopdpgddkgofdgpokfdkfdpoogk

It never goes down

Can some 1 add it into my commands list i’ll show a small part where i want it added please.

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("guild")) { c.sendMessage("You can fish sharks here!"); c.getPA().startTeleport(2603, 3403, 0, "modern"); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("clanpk")) { c.sendMessage("clan wars/pk trips"); c.getPA().startTeleport(3277, 3881, 0, "modern"); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("thief")) { c.sendMessage("Theif yay!"); c.getPA().startTeleport(2508, 4718, 0, "modern"); }[/quote]what teh fuck?

like this

It never goes down

Can some 1 add it into my commands list i’ll show a small part where i want it added please.

} if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("guild")) { c.sendMessage("You can fish sharks here!"); c.getPA().startTeleport(2603, 3403, 0, "modern"); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("clanpk")) { c.sendMessage("clan wars/pk trips"); c.getPA().startTeleport(3277, 3881, 0, "modern"); } if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("thief")) { c.sendMessage("Theif yay!"); c.getPA().startTeleport(2508, 4718, 0, "modern"); }

When i add it i get this

if (command.startsWith("help") && playerRights > 0) {{ yell("+ playerName + Needs some help"); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY;} if (command.startsWith("helpdesk") && playerRights > 1) { yell("A staff is coming to help you."); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY;}}

item.title: Helpdesk PI
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Evocation, post:2, topic:376286”][quote author=xocean link=topic=472224.msg3453399#msg3453399 date=1293910118]
Hello im trying to add a command ::helpdesk so when you teleport it sends a message to all the staff, or all palyers and staff aslong as i can get it working.

I really want this so people dont nag me 24/7 all they need to do is do ::helpdesk and a staff will go and help them.

Understand what im saying :P?
[/quote]
Add this with other commands.

if (command.startsWith("help") && playerRights > 0) { { yell("+ playerName + Needs some help"); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY; } if (command.startsWith("helpdesk") && playerRights > 1) { yell("A staff is coming to help you."); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY; } }[/quote]and add at each > a = so it becomes >= else only mods can request help

Read full topic

item.title: Helpdesk PI
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“xocean, post:1, topic:376286”]Hello im trying to add a command ::helpdesk so when you teleport it sends a message to all the staff, or all palyers and staff aslong as i can get it working.

I really want this so people dont nag me 24/7 all they need to do is do ::helpdesk and a staff will go and help them.

Understand what im saying :P?[/quote]
Add this with other commands.

if (command.startsWith("help") && playerRights > 0) { { yell("+ playerName + Needs some help"); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY; } if (command.startsWith("helpdesk") && playerRights > 1) { yell("A staff is coming to help you."); toX = XXXX; toY = YYYY; } }

Read full topic
